events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates.
The customer's issue has been categorized as a Delivery Delay based on their report of a late order and lack of tracking updates.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to handle the delivery delay complaint for this case.
Hello! I'm Alex from customer support. I understand your order hasn’t arrived yet, and I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status for you?
Sure, the order number is 12345ABC, and the shipping address is 789 Elm Street, Springfield.
Thank you for the information. I’ve contacted the courier service and learned there is an unexpected delay. We expect your package to arrive within three business days.
I appreciate the update. I hope the package arrives soon as I really need the item for an upcoming event.
Your package has been delivered according to the courier's confirmation. Please let us know if you have received it in good condition.
Just following up to ensure that you received your order and that everything is satisfactory. We're here if you need further assistance.
Since your delivery issue appears to be resolved and no further concerns were raised, this case will now be closed. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback helps us improve.
